fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Force all TI’s to go onto you
-Badly fake claim, giving yourself the ability of an evil role of your choice for the night

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-The evil role you choose cannot be able to kill more than one person
-When using your first ability, TIs will be notified that “There’s someone else that’s caught your attention, so you checked them instead”
-You’re always suspicious.
-If you’re hung, complain how everyone is always targeting you, and then don’t get hung (1 time)
-The first person to attempt to hang you again after this is immediately dealt an overkill attack. This cannot be prevented
